elements.label: Bright
elements.description: A remarkable conversationalist. They will help attract a more clever sort of sailor from the bars.

elements.label: Handy
elements.description: Willing to lend a hand even when the ship is docked in the wharves.

elements.label: Whistling
elements.description: This sailor knows some of the tunes of the Raconteur Network. Packages will more easily find their way to me.

elements.label: Noisy
elements.description: With stomping boots and endless bodily noises, it is taxing to carry a tune near them. This may affect my dealings with the Raconteur Network.

elements.label: Mute
elements.description: If speaking is silver and silence is gold, this sailor's tongue is gilded.

elements.label: Landlubber
elements.description: Regardless of their skills, this one will never be a true sailor.

elements.label: Singleminded
elements.description: This sailor is uninterested to think beyond it's regular duties.

elements.label: Rhythmless
elements.description: Perhaps they never learned, perhaps their Chor was stripped from them, but this sailor cannot carry a tune to save their life.

elements.label: Initiated
elements.description: Initiated into the Mysteries of the Moth.

elements.label: Inspired
elements.description: Inspired by the Teachings of The Lantern.

elements.label: Inducted
elements.description: Inducted into the Practices of the Forge.

elements.label: Conscripted
elements.description: Constripted to the Cause of the Edge.

elements.label: Sanctified
elements.description: Sanctified by the ministrations of Knock.
